fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Public Health, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Eu Forestry Strategy; Eu Clean Air Package; Circular Economy Package; European Innovation Partnership on Raw Materials; Bio-based Economy Strategy; Free Trade Agreements; Social Affairs.
organisation_name: European Organisation of the Sawmill industry (EOS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission operational expert group of the European Innovation Partnership on Raw Materials #E03392#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3392#Member#C#Expert Group on Forest-based Industries and Sectorally Related Issues#E01356#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1356#Member#C
membership: CEI-Bois, the European Confederation of woodworking industries
industry_forums: GLOBE EU:  the cross-party group of European Parliament legislators acting as the 'EP chapter' of GLOBE International (non-party political organisation that supports legislators through national chapters to develop and advance laws on climate change, natural capital accounting and forests).
relevant_communication:
Events:  
- Wood Action Days (Brussels, 22 - 24 September 2014) 
- International Softwood Conference (every year in different member country) 
- International Hardwood Conference (every year in different member country) 
- Club du Bois (twice a year -event with MEPS) 
-The city Forest project March 2017
